Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI, VirtualView
public interface View

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void actionPerformed()
    Notifies the user the current player has performed his main action
    void askForAction​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames, Action... availableActions)
    Shows the actions that the user can choose to perform
    void askLogin()
    Asks the user to log in

    Asks which Leader Card the user wants to use to convert a white marble

    Returns the username of the player

    Initializes the view and shows welcome screen

    Shows a list of Development Cards and asks to choose some of them

  • Method Details

    • showMessage

      void showMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows a generic message
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be shown

    • showErrorMessage

      void showErrorMessage​(java.lang.String message)
      Shows an error message
      Parameters:
      message - the error message to be shown

    • listLobbies

      void listLobbies​(java.util.List<Triple<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer>> availableLobbies)
      Shows the list of available lobbies
      Parameters:
      availableLobbies - a list of lobbies that the user can join. Each element of the list is a Triple composed as followed: - first: the name of the match - second: the number of players that have already joined the match - third: the maximum number of players that can join the match

    • resumeMatch

      void resumeMatch​(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Reset the view to the state indicated by the match object
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the PlayerBoard of the match to resume

    • init

      void init()
      Initializes the view and shows welcome screen

      Asks the user to log in
